title: Orange, Fennel and Garlic Marinated Olives
directions: In a bowl, combine all ingredients. Marinate olives, covered and chilled, stirring occasionally, at least 1 day and up to 3.
ingredients: 4 cups mixed Italian olives* such as Alfonse, Gaeta, and Sicilian,Â drained
Mixed Italian olives and caper berries are available at specialty foods shops.
